main.name: Andrew Lee
main.description: I am a full stack developer with a passion for building websites and applications
main.bio: Hello! I'm a full Stack Web Developer with a bachelors degree in Computer Science and Music. I have a strong grasp of CSS, Javascript, React.js, and Responsive Web Design. With a background in music, Iâ€™m known for my creativity, adaptability, resilience, and collaboration skills. I am always excited to demonstrate my skill set in Web Development by facing programming challenges with a fresh perspective and creative mindset. I'm always looking to work on a team of like-minded individuals that have a passion for enhancing web experience.

education.school: University of California, Los Angeles Extension
education.description: Studied HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Java, Node.js, React.js, Heroku, User Auth., MongoDB, MySQL. Received Certificate of completion and completed various projects showcasing my skill in these topics.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developing Front-End website architecture through the Symfony Framework and Back-End applications through PHP. Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones. Creating servers and databases for functionality through AWS. Maintaining and updating databases through MySQL and Doctrine. Setting up Third Party API Services.

work.title: Freelance React.js Developer
work.description: Worked with a team of three graphic designers to create a car configurator app for Super Mini Coopers using React.js. Utilized the MERN Stack to create a visually stunning UI and UX experience and a clean and organized server.

projects.title: Car Configurator
projects.category: Car configurator app created using React.js. This is only a copy I was allowed to use for my portfolio

projects.title: Google Books Search
projects.category: A MERN stack app that uses Google Books API to search for books. Users can then save them to a mongoDB database

projects.title: Poker Tracker
projects.category: A Poker Session tracker app built in LAMP stack (MVP only). Utilizes authentication and CRUD functionality. Still needs styling.

projects.title: Bird Friends!
projects.category: Coming Soon! A social media app for bird watching enthusiasts!
